mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_REMOULD_R_Other (
group_id , hos_id , copy_code ,
record_no ,
bus_type_code ,
ven_id ,
ven_no ,
create_emp ,
create_date ,
audit_emp ,
record_date ,
state ,
note ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{record_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{bus_type_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ven_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{ven_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{create_emp,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
to_date(#{create_date},'yyyy-MM-dd') ,
#{audit_emp,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
to_date(#{record_date},'yyyy-MM-dd') ,
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
)
mapper.select:
SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.record_no, a.bus_type_code, a.ven_id, a.ven_no, a.create_emp, a.create_date, a.audit_emp, a.record_date, a.state, c.sup_code, c.sup_name, case when a.state = 0 then '新建' when a.state = 1 then '审核' when a.state = 2 then '记录确认' else '' end state_name,
a.note FROM ass_remould_r_Other a left join hos_sup_dict c on a.group_id = c.group_id and a.hos_id =c.hos_id and a.ven_id = c.sup_id and a.ven_no = c.sup_no and c.is_stop = 0 and c.is_disable = 0 WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.record_no= #{record_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, record_no, bus_type_code, ven_id, ven_no, create_emp, create_date, audit_emp, record_date, state, note FROM ASS_REMOULD_R_Other where group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND record_no = #{record_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by group_id asc

{call PKG_ASS_APP.prc_CalcDepreSingle( #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN}, #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN}, #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{ass_year,jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{ass_month,jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{ass_naturs,jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, 'B', #{ass_json_str,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=OUT}, #{ass_AppCode,jdbcType=INTEGER,mode=OUT}, #{ass_ErrTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=OUT} )}
